value.query: query PlaybackAccessToken_Template($login: String!, $isLive: Boolean!, $vodID: ID!, $isVod: Boolean!, $playerType: String!, $platform: String!) {  streamPlaybackAccessToken(channelName: $login, params: {platform: $platform, playerBackend: "mediaplayer", playerType: $playerType}) @include(if: $isLive) {    value    signature   authorization { isForbidden forbiddenReasonCode }   __typename  }  videoPlaybackAccessToken(id: $vodID, params: {platform: $platform, playerBackend: "mediaplayer", playerType: $playerType}) @include(if: $isVod) {    value    signature   __typename  }}

query PlaybackAccessToken_Template($login: String!, $isLive: Boolean!, $vodID: ID!, $isVod: Boolean!, $playerType: String!, $platform: String!) {  streamPlaybackAccessToken(channelName: $login, params: {platform: $platform, playerBackend: "mediaplayer", playerType: $playerType}) @include(if: $isLive) {    value    signature   authorization { isForbidden forbiddenReasonCode }   __typename  }  videoPlaybackAccessToken(id: $vodID, params: {platform: $platform, playerBackend: "mediaplayer", playerType: $playerType}) @include(if: $isVod) {    value    signature   __typename  }}

query PlaybackAccessToken_Template($login: String!, $isLive: Boolean!, $vodID: ID!, $isVod: Boolean!, $playerType: String!, $platform: String!) {  streamPlaybackAccessToken(channelName: $login, params: {platform: $platform, playerBackend: "mediaplayer", playerType: $playerType}) @include(if: $isLive) {    value    signature   authorization { isForbidden forbiddenReasonCode }   __typename  }  videoPlaybackAccessToken(id: $vodID, params: {platform: $platform, playerBackend: "mediaplayer", playerType: $playerType}) @include(if: $isVod) {    value    signature   __typename  }}
